org.texgen.signals.modifier
Class NoisySignal

java.lang.Object
  org.texgen.textures.AbstractChannelSignal
      org.texgen.textures.ChainedChannelSignal
          org.texgen.signals.modifier.NoisySignal
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChannelSignal
public class NoisySignal
extends ChainedChannelSignal

Adds a level of noise to the signal from the source. 

 result = (source + noise(u,v))
 result = result scaled to lie between 0..1

Author:
Andy Gibson
